      int findDamage(Pokemon attacker, Pokemon defender)
      Description: This method calculates the total damage that a moves inflicts upon the defending Pokemon using the actual Pokmeon Games formula which uses both the attacking and defendind Pokemons stats, the Moves stats, and a number of other modifiers which is calculated in the findModifier method, which is called in this method.

      • Move

      • Move

        public Move(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Type> typeMap)
        Description: Creates a Move object using the name of the move. It uses the name to search for that moves entree in the "Moves" spreadsheet. It then reads the information from the spreadsheet and saves them in local instance variables to be used in the game. Pre condition: Spreadsheet file must exist and the name string must have an entree in the spreadsheet to read the data from Post condition: A Move object is created with the correct information
        Parameters:
        name, - the name of the Move object to be created. This is take and used to look through the spreadsheet to find the correct data entree
        typeMap, - a HashMap that converts types as Strings into real Type objects, see the Type class method for more details

    • Method Detail

      • findDamage

        public int findDamage(Pokemon attacker,
                      Pokemon defender)
        Description: This method calculates the total damage that a moves inflicts upon the defending Pokemon using the actual Pokmeon Games formula which uses both the attacking and defendind Pokemons stats, the Moves stats, and a number of other modifiers which is calculated in the findModifier method, which is called in this method. Pre condition: The calling Move object must be not null and neither can the attacker and defender Pokemon Post condition: The amount of damage the attacking Pokemon does to the defending Pokemon is returned
        Parameters:
        attacker, - The Pokemon attacking with this Move object
        defender, - The Pokemon being hit with this Move
        Returns:
        damage, the amount of damage done to the defending Pokemon
